data.prayer: Spirit, defend the church in the state of Gyeongsangbuk-do against being inward-focused.
data.verse: The Spirit of the Sovereign LORD is on me, because the LORD has anointed me to proclaim good news to the poor. He has sent me to bind up the brokenhearted, to proclaim freedom for the captives and release from darkness for the prisoners.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Gyeongsangbuk-do, South Korea

data.prayer: Father, we ask for networks of simple churches in every city in the state of Gyeongsangbuk-do, like Paul planted in Corinth and Ephesus.
data.verse: The churches in the province of Asia send you greetings. Aquila and Priscilla greet you warmly in the Lord, and so does the church that meets at their house.

data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the state of Gyeongsangbuk-do.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of Gyeongsangbuk-do, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Gyeongsangbuk-do, South Korea. Show them that faithfulness is better than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Father, guide the church in Gyeongsangbuk-do, South Korea to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.section_summary:
the state of Gyeongsangbuk-do, South Korea has a population of 2,708,800.

We estimate Gyeongsangbuk-do has 443,165 people who might know Jesus, 372,224 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,893,411 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 6 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, make the church in Gyeongsangbuk-do, South Korea humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?
